attributes.additional_details: It has been known for some time that North Korea violates more than the simple human rights laws upheld by the west and many other countries and now with a recent investigation there has been more evidence found to support this and yet the UN is not fully committed to have their leader Kim Jong Eun tried. I believe that we must show that the British people want our government to make this issue a priority and also show our support in being a country that leads the campaign to put right all of the wrongs. If you need further proof then read the book "Escape from Camp 14" which details a boys life in the camps who managed to escape.
